title: Jhin joins league of legends- comic
body:
A short comic I made about Jhin who is my new favourite champion and loves abusing his fellow lol champions.
You can like it on Facebook too if you enjoyed it :)
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10153968216648307&set=a.174748203306.123534.586753306&type=3&theater&notif_t=like

replies.body: Jhin, the VirtuRoastso.
hahaha yes!
This requires him to have a Jeff Ross skin immediately.
the smiley face is what gets me
Thanks!! :)
you know jhin is the strongest person lore wise when his words can make zed regret killing shens father as well as make shen talk about him being reworked like its a normal thing

> [{quoted}](name=Azteryz,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=T5nG5Ypp,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-02-05T02:53:14.012+0000)
>
> you know jhin is the strongest person lore wise when his words can make zed regret killing shens father as well as make shen talk about him being reworked like its a normal thing

Agreed, Zed seems heartless. But the way jhin talks about him in game makes him seem like a total baddass! xD

I nearly laughed out loud in class while reading this (almost died seeing Sona + Caitlyn's reactions in the last panel) ... You deserve an upvote sir. Hilarious comic!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I don't get it? Is there something in the lore i need to read?

He insults alot of other champions.
Calls Tahm Kench a fatass.
Insults Illaoi's thingy.
Mocks Zed.
Mocks Shen.
Straight up killed Sona at first, then tells her that her music is basically garbage and she isn't as good as him.
I dunno but he tells Cait something too.

All in all... He is the Roast Master.

Let me add some stuff that you missed:
- Calls Tahm Kench ugly
- Mocked Tahm's hat
- Basically stole Caitlyn's title as a sniper (Because Cait used to be the only sniper in the game, but now Jhin is the "true" sniper)
- Calls the tentacle "God" an idiot
- Dislikes Sona because she steals Jhin's spotlight
"Step out of my light! They call it background music!"

Minor fix:
> Insults Illaoi's thingy

Jhin thought girl's things are diamonds, but Illaoi wears gold
Lol what a legend
Its still gold though and funny thing really I thought that was a direct taunt to Taric calling him a woman when i heard it at first.

He's also insulting how much gold Illaoi has in her outfit/idol, says her Religion is a ton of useless blabbering, and is all "Take my soul if you'll shut up afterwards"

He also says Bard's sounds sound like a mess, Draven is nothing but a loud shouting moron, and calls Lucian's whole reason for fighting droll and essentially unoriginal
Thank you for pointing those things out for the ones who don't know his taunts!

> [{quoted}](name=Rendarkan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=T5nG5Ypp,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-02-05T06:24:37.435+0000)
>
> Insults Illaoi's thingy.

Bro...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Thank you! <3
Np! It's great!

{{champion:98}} "nobody cares about my rework" :(
me: I'd care more if they didn't make your support worse :(
{{champion:98}} " THEN PLAY ME TOP DAMN IT!"
me: ... I prefer you as a support .__.
{{champion:98}} ...
support zoned
Better than Marksman zoned though.
who is better at zoning?
River {{champion:98}}

{{champion:203}}  Race ya there...


...
...
Wrong champ

{{champion:202}} Already there.
{{champion:202}} "You will be part of the performance whichever lane you pick :) "

HOLY FUCK I NEVER TYHOUGHT I WOULD SAY THIS BUT TAHM IS SO FUCKING DAMN CUTE.
"My mummy gave me that hat... and i was born chubby..."
{{champion:223}} : "Can I get a hug and a cookie now?"
Tahm's reaction made me so sad holy shit and here I was hating the guy a minute ago
Seeing Tahm Kench sad, makes me feel super bad for some reason :/
I feel bad for poor tahm lol
Smiley face jhin skin pls.

http://grabilla.com/06206-cae8eda3-c5da-47d1-bbe2-2cadd539d16c.png#

There you go
Definately Not Jhin

I love the Kench one. Lmao
{{summoner:31}}
That third panel is the best.
Thank you!!
I haven't listened to Jhin's entire VO so I don't really get the joke. But good God, Cait's face in the last panel is nothing short of hysterical.

You should really listen to his taunts when you get the time, he roasts almost every adc (even makes fun of Lucian's story).

All in all he calls Tahm fat and ugly, threatens Shen and Zed, calls Illaoi stupid, wants to kill Sona and says her work is inferior to his.
That smiley face thing...Jhin is actually the TF2 Spy, isn't he?
... and i thought Tahm was soloq chat incarnated
Tahm's lines are a cute puppy's bark compared to Jhin's roasting, hahaha!
Legit, I feel bad for tahm now :C
What did jhin tell Caitlyn? I don't recall...

He actually just told her "You should aim for the heart,you shoot to kill" (and he wants to kill Vi AND stole her title as a sniper). But in the comic Caitlyn didn't know what he was going to tell her, so she was expecting the worst.
XD This is great!
Thank you!! :)
HaHa
